name: Elemental Warlord DEMO
description:
Elemental Warlord is Offline RPG game.

In this DEMO version,You can be maximum 15 level,and enjoy in the DEMO version of the world.

STORY of the DEMO game:

You are Orc Shaman,and You want to learn to be the best Shaman in the world.Neo and Blu will teach You how to move and use spells,You can choose the gender of Your character,and You can set Yours name.There are several kinds of monsters You can slay,and many suprises waiting for You in this world.

-This is just Demonstration Version of the game,and some things might be changed when full version of the game came out! ^_^

THIS GAME IS ALSO MADE FOR KIDS!
